problem: 如图,在△ABC中,点D,E分别在边AB、AC上,DE∥BC．已知AE=6,\frac{AD}{DB}=\frac{3}{4},则AC的长等于()
comment: 本题考查了平行线分线段成比例定理:三条平行线截两条直线,所得的对应线段成比例．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, vertices D and E are on edges AB and AC respectively, DE ∥ BC. Given that AE = N_0, \frac{AD}{DB}=\frac{N_1}{N_2}, then the length of AC is equal to ()
